definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
expanse of water/ooze/(onom.) bark/classifier for liquids: pool, puddle
expanse of water/ooze/(onom.) bark/classifier for liquids: pool, puddle

sentences.english: Tom is a cute boy who has big eyes and a childish body.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是個很可愛的男孩，有一雙水汪汪的大眼睛。

sentences.english: Watery eyes like two glass beads.
sentences.chinese: 水汪汪的眼睛像兩顆玻璃珠。

sentences.english: A pair of watery eyes, so bright.
sentences.chinese: 水汪汪的一對眼睛，那麼明亮。

sentences.english: And at this time I have a eyeful watery tears.
sentences.chinese: 而此時的我，已是滿眼水汪汪的淚水。

sentences.english: His watery crossed eyes rolled in exaltation .
sentences.chinese: 他得意洋洋地轉動着水汪汪的鬥雞眼。

sentences.english: After a moment he looked up with watery eyes.
sentences.chinese: 過了一會，他擡起水汪汪的眼睛，看着大家。

sentences.english: Mary's blue dress goes well with her big dancing eyes.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗的藍色連衣裙與她那對水汪汪的大眼睛很相配。

sentences.english: In this full felicity, tears welled up to their eyes every instant.
sentences.chinese: 在這種美滿的時刻，他們隨時都會感到眼裏淚水汪汪。

definition: lit. cherry mouth (idiom)/fig. a delicate, ruby-lipped mouth
eyeball/fig. the apple of one's eye (i.e. favorite person)
